The user can at any time request the erasure of his personal data, especially if it is no longer useful for the purposes for which they have been collected.

The latter cannot claim any compensation in the event of consequences resulting from the exercise of his right of opposition.
Cette demande d’opposition pourra cepend: This opposition request may however be refused if the personal data of the user must be used in a legal framework.

Pourquoi utiliser Comparateur Gaz et Éle: Why use gas and electricity comparator
Ce site vous permettra de savoir s'il es: This site will allow you to know whether or not useful to change contracts currently in view of the price of your current contract.
Le service est gratuit et se base sur vo: The service is free and is based on your actual consumption.
D'où proviennent les données utilisées p: Where the data used by the comparator comes
Toutes les données proviennent des diffé: All data comes from different suppliers and their pricing cards.
Est-ce que l'utilisation du comparateur: Is the use of the comparator free
Oui, quoi qu'il arrive vous ne payez pas: Yes, whatever happens you don't pay to make your comparison
J'ai effectué plusieurs comparaisons sur: I made several comparisons on several sites and the amounts vary, why?
Tout d'abord, ce comparateur ne fait une: First of all, this comparator makes a comparison only on suppliers' prices, which implies that network prices and distribution, as well as the various federal taxes are not included in this calculation.
Ces tarifs ne sont pas calculés car ils: These prices are not calculated because they are exactly the same, regardless of the supplier you choose.
Il se peut toutefois que certains montan: However, some amounts may differ from a few cents, or even a few euros depending on the comparator chosen, some making rounds during their calculations.
Ce site n'effectue pas d'arrondis, excep: This site does not make rounded, except on the final result.
Les prix de mon contrat ne concordent pa: The prices of my contract do not agree with those of the site, why?
Il faut tout d'abord distinguer deux cat: It is first necessary to distinguish two categories of contract, namely variable contracts and fixed contracts.
Dans le cas des contrats fixes:: In the case of fixed contracts:
Le comparateur prend en compte la date d: The comparator takes into account the start date of your contract to make a comparison over 1 year.
Le prix de votre contrat ne varie pas su: The price of your contract does not vary over the duration of it.
Dans le cas des contrats variables:: In the case of variable contracts:
Le comparateur prend en compte le mois e: The comparator takes into account the current month to make a comparison over 1 year.
Le prix de votre contrat variant chaque: The price of your contract varying each month it is useless to compare a price of a past month which is no longer the current price.
, nous sommes heureux de vous compter pa: , we are happy to count you among our members

- D'être prévenu des nouveaux tarifs des: - to be warned of the new prices of suppliers
- De recevoir les dernières informations: - to receive the latest information on the energy markets
- D'être prévenu lorsque les tarifs sont: - to be warned when the prices are down
Vous avez souscrit à un abonnement annue: You have subscribed to an annual subscription allowing you to benefit from the following advantages:
Vous souhaitez voir les informations rel: Do you want to see the information relating to your subscription?
Nous y répondrons dans les plus brefs dé: We will answer it as soon as possible
Voici un résumé de ce qui nous est parve: Here is a summary of what has reached us:
Les champs marqués d'un astérisque sont: Fields marked with an asterisk are required
Ce contrat n'existe pas dans votre régio: This contract does not exist in your region
